## Bio

Sita Lujintanon is an epidemiologist by training and an experienced implementation researcher who works to improve equity in HIV care engagement. She has supported the implementation of the key population-led HIV treatment services in Thailand. She uses implementation science frameworks to design and evaluate implementation strategies that aim to improve the HIV cascade outcomes. Sita has a growing interest in overcoming missing data the in the real world to improve outcome assessment.
